p: Further work on sustainable finance in 2021 has included a new sustainable finance strategy (European Commission 2021c), a proposed regulation establishing a European green bond standard (European Commission 2021d) and a proposed directive on corporate sustainability reporting (Commission 2021a). In the context of disclosure and reporting, it is noteworthy that the EU is pioneering the ‘double materiality’ approach, according to which undertakings are obliged to report both their impacts on sustainability and on how sustainability matters affect their performance (see, e.g., European Commission 2021a, art. 1.3).
